q: "It's a good move. It( the triumvirate management structure) was always one of things that concerned us a little bit," said Ryan Jacob, portfolio manager with the Jacob Internet Fund. I don't remember that this site was ever closed, Zahi Hawass said.( NEW YORK)-- The number of people killed in Egypt since anti-government protests started two weeks ago has been grossly under-reported, according to the New York-based Human Rights Watch.
